# spdx-license-ids

A list of [SPDX license](https://spdx.org/licenses/) identifiers

[**Download JSON**](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/shinnn/spdx-license-ids/master/spdx-license-ids.json)

## Use as a JavaScript Library
